overview.basic:
"This world's not big enough for all of us, so it's time you step aside to make room for me."
Lead fantastic and varied races across a large underground world, claim artifacts and places of power to trample your foes. Before long, though, your armies will be whittled down, and you will abandon them, and lead a new race!
Conquer and control regions on the board, take advantage of your race's powers, and claim the most points to become the undisputed ruler of the Small World.
